subject: Stupid question
author: mrscaptainjack2
full_text: I was on a long road trip today with some friends, and just for fun to kill time, we pulled out the box.  We got some responses that were long sentences, all in one voice, in what sounded like Russian -- like a Russian radio station.  But I could hear the clicks as the sweep kept going.  Is it possible, if you are close to a tower or something, to pick up such a strong signal that you get long, loud complete sentences from newscasters?  (This was AM radio.)
